patthana8.1:2.1_0: Nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—nahetuṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ
patthana8.1:2.1_1: paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe… dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā
patthana8.1:2.1_2: cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ; paṭisandhikkhaṇe …pe… (yāva mahābhūtā.) Nahetuṁ dhammaṁ
patthana8.1:2.1_3: paṭicca na nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—nahetū khandhe paṭicca hetū; paṭisandhikkhaṇe
patthana8.1:2.1_4: …pe… nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ca na nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana8.1:3.1_0: Na nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca na nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Na nahetuṁ dhammaṁ
patthana8.1:3.1_1: paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Na nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ca
patthana8.1:3.1_2: na nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana8.1:4.1_0: Nahetuñca na nahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuñca
patthana8.1:4.1_1: na nahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca na nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuñca na
patthana8.1:4.1_2: nahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ca na nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana8.1:5.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate nava.
patthana8.1:7.1_0: Na nahetu dhammo na nahetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Na nahetu dhammo nahetussa
patthana8.1:7.1_1: dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Na nahetu dhammo nahetussa ca na nahetussa ca dhammassa
patthana8.1:8.1_0: Nahetu dhammo nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Nahetu dhammo na nahetussa
patthana8.1:8.1_1: dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Nahetu dhammo nahetussa ca na nahetussa ca dhammassa
patthana8.1:9.1_0: Na nahetu dhammo na nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Na nahetu dhammo
patthana8.1:9.1_1: nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Na nahetu dhammo nahetussa ca na nahetussa
patthana8.1:10.1_0: Nahetu ca na nahetu ca dhammā nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Nahetu
patthana8.1:10.1_1: ca na nahetu ca dhammā na nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Nahetu ca
patthana8.1:10.1_2: na nahetu ca dhammā nahetussa ca na nahetussa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana8.1:11.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava …pe… purejāte pacchājāte tīṇi …pe… kamme tīṇi …pe… jhāne
patthana8.1:11.1_1: tīṇi …pe… vippayutte pañca …pe… avigate nava. (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvāraṁ, evaṁ vitthāretabbaṁ.)
